Title: TimersXP
Description: The Timers Project is an open-source stopwatch & countdown timer for Windows, and possibly other platforms in the future.
HomeWiki:
TimersXP - Keep track of all your time now and forever!

Project Description
The Timers Project is an open-source stopwatch & countdown timer for Windows, and possibly other platforms in the future.

This is about the development of the Countdown & Stopwatch skinnable Timers project. Some of the things that will be done are refactoring of the existing code for following the MVVM design pattern (Model-View-View-Model). Redesign of the user interface to allow for skinning, development of a website, adding & development of the skins, and many other enhancements.





Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
